info.name: TVTropes Neoclassic
info.description: Restyles TVTropes.org to resemble the pre-2015 site. It's not an exact recreation, but it includes an all-white layout, rounded blue buttons and a few other visual tweaks. Includes alternate styles for the Darth Wiki and Sugar Wiki regions of the site.
info.additionalInfo:
Note: Ads have been removed from the screenshot above. This style is not an adblocker (though if you have an adblocker it should function as normal).

Version 1.2 - Jan 18, 2015
- Image captions now display correctly when overlapping another part of a trope page (such as the Examples banner)
- Disabled some navigation elements on the forum's Add Post page

Version 1.1 - Jan 15, 2015
- Fixed overflow on buttons with unusually long labels
- Added button formatting to some pages that use SPAN ONCLICK instead of A
- Changed the colour of the user menus for Darth Wiki and Sugar Wiki

Version 1.0 - Jan 13, 2015
